Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockDetection
    Contains all methods necessary to detect the enemy's flag based on light intensity readings.
    Controller
    Controller takes care of all actions required to complete the course and the sequence of these actions.
    FallingEdgeUSLocalization
    Performs falling edge localization.
    LightLocalization
    LightLocalization class is responsible for localizing the robot through line detection getting the derivative of the light level.
    Navigation
    Contains all methods responsible for moving robot by desired distances, rotating by desired angles, and traveling to desired points.
    ObstacleAvoidance
    Handles avoiding of obstacles such as blocks and possibly opponent robot.
    RiverTraversal
    Responsible for finding a path through shallow water and actual traversal of river using shallow water crossing.
    ZiplineTraversal
    Responsible for handling traversal of zipline by arriving to premount point, localizing at premount point, mounting zipline, traversing it, and localize after dismount.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FallingEdgeUSLocalization.AngleType
    List of angles detected: alpha is first angle detected, beta is second angle detected.
    FallingEdgeUSLocalization.LocalizationType
    List of localization types.
